attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed by an app before. When I just opened it, I noticed a few glitches here and there. Nothing too bad, just the screen freezing up, pop up ads not letting me exit out, etc. BUT, then it got worse. The app somehow managed to leak my entire photo gallery out. A trump account tweeted each of my photos one by one?? Then, my address got leaked! And finally, my social security number too! My family is scared for our lives because of this app, my life will never be the same. Please DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS. This app in itself is a betrayal to the hardworking Americans of our great country. I still cannot believe Trumpâ€™s administration has let this happen. He has lost my vote.
attributes.title: Horrible, awful, worst app ever.
